name: Peak2Pacific

registration_platform.name: Active Network (CampsCUI)
registration_platform.notes: All registration handled through Active Network. Summer 2026 sessions not yet posted (as of Jan 24, 2026). Winter and Spring currently available.

data_hints.pricing_location: Pricing visible on Active.com registration portal after clicking View on a program
data_hints.extended_care: No extended care documented in current listings
data_hints.sessions: Summer camps run June 8th - August 16th (per website graphic). Individual session dates TBD.
data_hints.ages: Campers: Ages 3-12, LITs: Ages 13-14, CITs: Ages 15-18

mission: PEAK2PACIFIC inspires life-long explorers, learners and nature advocates for our future generations; modeling respect, responsibility, and sustainability through our outdoor adventures and environmental education programs.
testimonials: Karen is an amazing leader who has a wealth of worldly knowledge and experiences; always creating and inspiring a life of adventure for all! - Teacher & P2P Camper Parent

Peak2Pacific's outdoor education and camp programs are the only after-school, spring break and summer camp programs that are loved, trusted and repeatedly requested by BOTH parents and kids year after year. - Marine Biologist & P2P Camper Parent
special_notes: Wix-based website with limited text content - relies heavily on images and embedded slideshows. Main site content loads via JavaScript with some navigation challenges. Registration is handled entirely through Active Network (Active.com CampsCUI platform). Summer 2026 sessions not yet posted to registration system as of January 24, 2026. PDF resources for schedule and FAQs are linked from camp programs page. Site redirects from peak2pacific.com to www.peak2pacific.com. Run by Karen & Austin (small family business). Offers year-round programs: Summer, Fall, Winter, Spring break camps plus after-school and school enrichment programs.
scraping_challenges: Content loads dynamically, causing navigation timeouts
Homepage has slideshow galleries with minimal text
Limited program details on main site - detailed info in PDFs and registration portal
Site occasionally triggers unexpected navigation behavior
Registration platform (Active.com) is separate from main site
Summer session details not yet published to registration system

schedule_seasons.fall_break: Single-day or multi-day sessions during fall breaks
schedule_seasons.spring_break: Mar 13 - Jun 5, 2026 (includes individual day camps and full spring break week Mar 30 - Apr 3)
